com.dessert.pages.base

类 BasePage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dessert.pages.base.BasePage

  • public class BasePage
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenient utility methods for all page objects.

    为所有页面对象提供便利的工具方法。

    作者:
    Renta

        public java.lang.String switchToNewWindow(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Click on element and switch to the new window. This will save and return the handle of previous window.

        点击元素并跳转到新打开的窗口

      • switchToNewWindowIfExist

        public java.lang.String switchToNewWindowIfExist(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Click on element and switch to the new window.

        This will save and return the handle of previous window.

        点击元素,如果有新打开窗口，那么就跳转到新开窗口，如果没有新开窗口，就在本窗口打开新页面

        参数:
        element -
        返回:
        返回前一个or当前窗口的句柄

      • switchToNewWindowAfterTriggered

        public java.lang.String switchToNewWindowAfterTriggered(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                                                        org.openqa.selenium.WebElement trigger)
        Click on element and switch to the new window. If the element is not displayed, click other element to let it out first.
        This will save and return the handle of previous window.

        点击元素打开新窗口。如果元素不存在，点击其他元素使该元素先显示出来，然后再点击

        参数:
        element -
        返回:
        handle of previous window

      • switchBackAndForthWindow

        public java.lang.String switchBackAndForthWindow(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Click on element, switch to the new window and then switch back.

        This will save and return the handle of previous window.

        点击元素打开新窗口后切回到前一窗口

        参数:
